name: TowerExcellent
description:
Tower Excellent is a unique retro & difficult platform game.

Complete the levels and reach the final level, It's that easy, right? Well, as long as you have the necessary skill to do it, the place is full of monsters and deadly traps!

An adventurer is looking for a legendary sword to save his town from the monsters, but he fell into the trap of an evil magician, you will have to overcome several obstacles in order to reach the top of the tower and escape.

✔ 10 - 30 Minutes Duration

✔ 7 Levels + Secrets

✔ Play with a gamepad
